name: Enappd
tagline: Handcrafted Innovation in apps and web
description:
(Enappd was previously Youstart)
Enappd provides off-the-shelf app starters and templates in various technologies. We also provide custom solutions in web, mobile and cloud related software development. We make customized, fast and secure products. Being a platform to serve startups, we keep ourselves updated with the latest technologies and hence deliver state-of-the-art development solutions.
Our dynamic, experienced and enthusiastic team works efficiently to provide the best possible solutions for your development needs. We help you choose from a wide variety of front-end, back-end, mobile, cloud and database services. (We get your ideas rolling)
Our aim is to utilize the latest technologies to shape your idea into a product. We make you start, at Enappd.
